parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of results to skip from the beginning of the available set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to read from the available set

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A specification of one or more fields to sort results by. Of format `<field> [asc | desc]`. Sortable Fields: [email, firstname, lastname, username]

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A specification of search terms to filter results by. Of format `<field1>:<value1>,...`. Searchable Fields: [userName, firstName, lastName, email]

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A specification of properties to <<filtering,filter>> results by. Of format `<filterKey>:<filterValue>`. Supported Filters: [userStatus]
